name: Ávaxta Djús
description:
Ávaxta Djús is a game by me Steingerður Lóa,  with pictures by my daughter (Brynja) and wife (Auður Ákadóttir).

Start by clicking the screen, click and drag the fruit to fling them. Get some juice in the glas!

Fylltu hingað means Fill up to here in Icelandic.

There is no sound! The game is 6 levels.
